sentence: Bureau staff also determined that three other lesser-known GOP candidates Donna Brandenburg, Michael Brown and Michael Markey did not turn in enough valid signatures.
author: DAVID EGGERT
title: Primary problem: Michigan GOP governor candidates short signatures

sentence: Michael Brown, Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey also be excluded from the ballot for having too few signatures.
author: Paul Egan
title: State elections report: James Craig and Perry Johnson filed too few signatures for ballot

sentence: Brown, as well as financial adviser Michael Markey, former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, businesswoman Donna Brandenburg and self-described quality guru Perry Johnson, all had signatures that the bureau recommended to be deemed insufficient as many were fraudulent.
title: GOP candidates deemed ineligible as massive signature fraud scandal upends Michigan gubernatorial race
